channel.title: ALL server-makers...Help me please
channel.description:
I am VERY frustrated at makeing a server....I have my no-ip acount registered, acdivated, my server on it, my compile works from my testscape source, I have JDK, I did EVERYTHING up to port fowarding because I'm confused on that.i do have a router....Also, I am willing to go to Hamachi....I know how to work Hamachi, just, makeing a Hamachi server...Also, here is what it says in my compiler which I don't know is right...
[code]Note:stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note:Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/code]
Also, this is my Compiler's code...
[code]@echo off title rarescape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code]
My runserver says...
[code]Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/code]
My runserver code is...
[code]@echo off title rarescape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
Hope that helps helping me!!! :)

item.title: ALL server-makers...Help me please
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

He isn’t actually getting a problem idiot, he just made a thread saying how he’s getting messages while running the server.

OGM!!!@@ I GITD A MESSGE WHN I RUN THE SERVR!! OGMM I NEED CODRS 2 HLP ME FIX THI!!!@@332

Read full topic

item.title: ALL server-makers...Help me please

item.description:
@pk3r0fz4mmy wrote:

the recompile with xlint thing isnt an error mate, just ignore it ur server still runs normally[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 12:13:01 AM[/size][hr]as long as it says starting testscape server on:blah blah blah ur good to go
